name: Catch & Release
description: Catch & Release places you on a beautiful mountain lake and lets you freely explore and row around while you choose your fishing spot and take in the scenery.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP 1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4 GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4590 / AMD Ryzen 7 1700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
